languages.text: {n}Лицо Соломона, и до того сложно читаемое, достигает пика непроницаемости.{/n} "Только маршал может говорить за всех Арбитес Простора. Я лишь проктор и клянусь — я всецело служу Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "Да пребудет Закон, Лорд-Инквизитор". {n}Проктор отдает честь, стоит внимательному взгляду Калькасара задержаться на бессстрастном лице арбитра.{/n}
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: {n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Соломона, и до того сложно читаемое, достигает пика непроницаемости.{/n} "Только маршал может говорить за всех Арбитес Простора. Я лишь проктор и клянусь — я всецело служу Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

{n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

{n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

{n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

{n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes ohnehin schon schwer zu lesendes Gesicht erstarrt zu einer undurchdringlichen Maske.{/n} "Nur der Marschall kann für alle Arbites in der Ausdehnung sprechen. Aber ich als Proktor schwöre, dass ich allein dem Lex Imperia diene."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes ohnehin schon schwer zu lesendes Gesicht erstarrt zu einer undurchdringlichen Maske.{/n} "Nur der Marschall kann für alle Arbites in der Ausdehnung sprechen. Aber ich als Proktor schwöre, dass ich allein dem Lex Imperia diene."

languages.text: {n}L'expression de Solomorne, qui était déjà difficile à déchiffrer, se mue en un masque impénétrable.{/n} « Seul le maréchal peut parler au nom de tout l'Arbites dans les Étendues, mais en ce qui me concerne, je jure que je sers inconditionnellement la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression de Solomorne, qui était déjà difficile à déchiffrer, se mue en un masque impénétrable.{/n} « Seul le maréchal peut parler au nom de tout l'Arbites dans les Étendues, mais en ce qui me concerne, je jure que je sers inconditionnellement la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的脸本就面无表情，此刻更像是牢不可破的面具一般。{/n}“只有元帅本人才能代表科罗努斯扩区的法务部成员发言。不过，身为监察官，我发誓全心全意为帝国律法服务。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的脸本就面无表情，此刻更像是牢不可破的面具一般。{/n}“只有元帅本人才能代表科罗努斯扩区的法务部成员发言。不过，身为监察官，我发誓全心全意为帝国律法服务。”

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Solomorne, habitualmente difícil de interpretar, se convierte en una máscara impenetrable.{/n} «Tan solo el Mariscal puede hablar por todos los Arbitrator de la Extensión. En lo que a mí respecta, como Procurador, juro que sirvo únicamente a la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Solomorne, habitualmente difícil de interpretar, se convierte en una máscara impenetrable.{/n} «Tan solo el Mariscal puede hablar por todos los Arbitrator de la Extensión. En lo que a mí respecta, como Procurador, juro que sirvo únicamente a la Lex Imperialis».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの顔はもともと感情を読み取りにくかったが、今やまったく表情の読めない仮面と化していた。{/n}「エクスパンスの高等裁定局全体を代表して発言できるのは将帥だけです。ですが、代理人としての私自身は、全身全霊をもってレックス・インペリアに仕えていると誓います」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの顔はもともと感情を読み取りにくかったが、今やまったく表情の読めない仮面と化していた。{/n}「エクスパンスの高等裁定局全体を代表して発言できるのは将帥だけです。ですが、代理人としての私自身は、全身全霊をもってレックス・インペリアに仕えていると誓います」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un hâlihazırda ne hissettiği anlaşılmayan surat ifadesi, nüfuz edilemez bir maskeye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Enginlik'teki tüm Arbites mensupları adına konuşabilecek tek kişi Miralay'dır. Ancak bir Üsteğmen olarak kendi adıma yemin ederim, ben yalnızca Lex İmperialis'e hizmet ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's face, already difficult to read, now becomes an impenetrable mask.{/n} "Only the Marshal can speak for all the Arbites in the Expanse. But for myself as a Proctor, I swear that I wholly serve the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un hâlihazırda ne hissettiği anlaşılmayan surat ifadesi, nüfuz edilemez bir maskeye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Enginlik'teki tüm Arbites mensupları adına konuşabilecek tek kişi Miralay'dır. Ancak bir Üsteğmen olarak kendi adıma yemin ederim, ben yalnızca Lex İmperialis'e hizmet ediyorum."
